content: toasty toes baby booties these simple little booties are a quick knit they are knit flat starting at the bottom center and bind off at the top of the cuff with one seam to sew as written they are sized to fit a newborn or the stitch counts or gauge can be easily manipulated to obtain a larger size they take little yarn and so can be made from sock yarn leftovers materials -fingering weight yarn approximately 90 yards -needles sized us #1 2 25 mm or size needed to obtain gauge booties are worked flat back and forth they may be worked on a 16 or 24-inch circular or straight needles -4 small stitch markers gauge 8 stitches/inch to obtain approximately newborn sized booties using heavier yarn such as sport weight and larger needles will yield larger sized booties or cast on more stitches and adjust stitch counts to obtain a larger size pattern cast on 36 stitches knit 1 row set-up row knit 2 m1l pm knit 15 pm m1r knit 2 m1l pm knit 15 pm m1r knit 2 row 1 knit row 2 *knit to marker m1l sm knit to marker sm m1r* repeat across row repeat row 1 and 2 until there are total of 60 stitches 8 sts marker 15 sts marker 14 sts marker 15 sts marker 8 sts work 10 row 5 ridges back and forth in garter stitch now you will begin decreasing to form the front of the bootie the stockinette toe-box row 1 knit 34 sts ssk turn work row 2 slip 1 purlwise p 8 p2tog turn work row 3 slip 1 purlwise k to 1 stitch before gap ssk turn work row 4 slip 1 purlwise p to 1 stitch before gap p2tog turn work repeat row 3 and 4 until 42 sts remain 16 sts 10 sts 16 sts row 5 slip 1 k to 1 stitch before gap ssk knit to end row 6 p to 1 stitch before gap p2tog p to end 40 sts remain now you will begin working the ribbed cuff change to contrasting color yarn if desired optional eyelet row to insert an i-cord tie around ankle knit 1 *k2tog yo repeat from * to last st knit 1 then slip 1purlwise with yarn to back k1 p2 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end of row repeat this row until ribbed cuff measures 2 inches bind off loosely break yarn leaving a long tail for seaming repeat for second bootie enjoy those little piggies ©samantha blake 2013 for personal use only items made from this
